org.sql: SELECT users.username FROM users INNER JOIN podcast_ownerships ON users.id = podcast_ownerships.user_id WHERE podcast_ownerships.podcast_id = "$1"

rewrites.sql: SELECT users.username FROM users INNER JOIN podcast_ownerships ON users.id = podcast_ownerships.user_id WHERE podcast_ownerships.podcast_id = "$1" LIMIT 1
